source_sentence: 大周刊定眾經目錄卷第十四(見定
translation: Daju Zhou dingzong jing mulu, vol. 14 (see Ding)

source_sentence: 流行入藏錄卷下)
translation: Popularization of the Tripiṭaka Record (Vol. 2)

source_sentence: 大唐天后勅佛授記寺沙門明佺等撰
translation: Written by Śrī Nephrite of the Temple of Buddha Granting Records, Imao Tien Hou of the Great Tang

source_sentence: 小乘修多羅藏二百七部(四百四十三卷)四十四帙單譯經陰持入經一部二卷大安般守意經一部二卷(或一卷)大安般經一卷八大人覺經出家緣經(一云出家因緣經)阿含正行經(一名佛說正意經)十八泥犁經法受塵經禪行法想經佛說處處經右七經同卷。
translation: The lesser vehicle sūtra collection of two hundred and seven books (four hundred and forty-three volumes) contains forty-four books of single-translation scriptures, one two-volume scripture on the aggregates, one two-volume scripture on the mind, one two-volume scripture on the mind, and one one-volume scripture on the eight elements, one on the causes and conditions for leaving home, one on the causes and conditions for leaving home, one on the correct practices of the Āgamas, one on the correct intentions of the Buddhas, one on the eighteen nirayas, one on the reception of dust, one on the meditation practices, one on the conceptions of the Dharma, and one on the methods explained by the Buddha, all seven of these scriptures are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 堅意經(一名堅心正意經一名堅心經)長者子懊惱三處經(亦云長者懊惱經亦直云三處惱經)揵陀國王經須摩提長者經阿難四事經未生怨經三品弟子經(一名弟子學有三輩經或無有字)四願經右八經同卷。
translation: The Sutra of Firm Intent (a sutra of firm mind and correct intent, a sutra of firm intent), the Sutra of the Three Places of Distress of the Son of the Elder (also called the Sutra of the Three Places of Distress of the Elder, and directly the Sutra of the Three Places of Distress), the Sutra of King Gandharāja, the Sutra of Sumati the Elder, the Sutra of the Four Affairs of Ānanda, the Sutra of the Unborn Enemies, the Sutra of the Three Classes of Disciples (a sutra of the Three Categories of Discipleship, or without the words), and the Sutra of the Four Vows, the right eight sūtras in the same volume.

source_sentence: 胞胎經一卷(一名胞胎受身經)
translation: Sutra on the Embryo in One Volume (a sutra on the Embryo's Acceptance of the Body)

source_sentence: 五百弟子自說本緣經一卷(化度錄云五百弟子自說本起經)右陰持入等二十經九卷同帙。
translation: Five Hundred Disciples Self-explaining the Origin and Conditions of the Sutra in One Volume (Record of the Conversion of the Five Hundred Disciples: Five Hundred Disciples Self-explaining the Origin and Conditions of the Sutra)

source_sentence: 四輩經
translation: Four Categories Sutra

source_sentence: 大迦葉本經(寶唱錄無大字)
translation: Mahākāśyapa-sūtra (Baochuan lu without large letters)

source_sentence: 當來變經(或云當來變滅經)
translation: Sutra of the Future Transformation (also called Sutra of the Future Transformation and Cessation)

source_sentence: 清淨法行經
translation: Sutra on the Practice of Pure Dharma

source_sentence: 右四經同卷。
translation: The right four scriptures are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 過去佛分衛經
translation: Sutra on the Past Buddha's Part-Defense

source_sentence: 時非時經(一名時經)
translation: Sutra of the Hours and the Untimely (a scripture of the hours)

source_sentence: 羅云忍辱經(一名忍辱經)
translation: Rāhula-nirdeśa-sūtra (a scripture on forbearance)

source_sentence: 佛為年少比丘說正事經
translation: Sutra on the Correct Practices Spoken by the Buddha for a Young Monk

source_sentence: 難提釋經
translation: Nandimitrāvatāra-sūtra

source_sentence: 右五經同卷。
translation: The right five scriptures are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 沙曷比丘功德經
translation: Sutra of the Merits of Śākyamuni

source_sentence: 救護身命濟人病苦尼經
translation: Sutra of the Nuns Who Save Their Lives and Help Others Suffer from Illness

source_sentence: 右二經同卷。
translation: The right two sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 五苦章句經一卷(又名五苦經一云淨除罪蓋經娛樂佛法經一名五道章句經)般泥洹時大迦葉赴佛經(或云摩訶迦葉經)大魚事經見正經(一名生死變識經)阿難七夢經(一名阿難八夢經或無八字)呵鵰阿那含經(一名荷鵰阿那含經一名阿調阿那含經)右六經同卷。
translation: The Sutra of the Five Sufferings (also known as the Sutra of the Five Sufferings, a scripture on purifying and removing the hindrances of sin, a scripture on the entertainment of the Buddha's teachings, a scripture on the five destinies, a scripture on the five destinies, a scripture on the journey of Mahākāśyapa to Buddha at the time of his nirvāṇa, a scripture on the affairs of the great fish, a scripture on the right view, a scripture on the transformations of birth and death, a scripture on the seven dreams of Ānanda, a scripture on the eight dreams of Ānanda, or a scripture without eight words, a scripture on the nonreturner, a scripture on the nonreturner, and six scriptures on the right, all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 達摩多羅禪經一部二卷(一名不淨觀經一名道地經)栴檀樹經燈指因緣經佛臨般涅槃略說教誡經(一名遺教經)婦人遇辜經(一名婦遇對經)右五經同卷。
translation: Sutra of the Contemplation of Dharmatara (1) A Sutra of the Contemplation on Impurity (1) A Sutra of the Path to the Ground (2) A Sutra of the Sandalwood Tree (2) A Sutra of the Lamp Pointing to Causes and Conditions (3) A Sutra of the Deathbed Injunction (4) A Sutra of the Deathbed Injunction (5) A Sutra of a Woman's Encounter with Khu (5) The same volume.

source_sentence: 辯意長者子問經(一名長者問意經)淨飯王般涅槃經右二經同卷。
translation: Sutra of the Questions of the Son of Pratibhāna (A Sutra of the Questions of the Son of Pratibhāna) Right two sūtras in the same volume.

source_sentence: 無垢優婆夷問經
translation: Wúgò upaji wen jing

source_sentence: 四天王經
translation: Sutra of the Four Heavenly Kings

source_sentence: 十二頭陀經(一名沙門頭陀經)
translation: Sutra of the Twelve Disciplines (a scripture of the disciples)

source_sentence: 摩訶迦葉度貧母經
translation: Mahākāśyapa-sūtra

source_sentence: 十二品生死經
translation: Sutra on the Twelve Classes of Birth and Death

source_sentence: 樹提伽經
translation: Jyotiṣka-sūtra

source_sentence: 四品學法經
translation: Sutra on the Four Levels of Study of the Dharma

source_sentence: 右七經同卷。
translation: The right seven sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 右四輩等三十二經十卷同帙。
translation: The right four groups of people and thirty-two other scriptures are in ten volumes and one book.

source_sentence: 本事經一部七卷
translation: The main text is a seven-fascicle scripture.

source_sentence: 諫王經(亦名大小諫王經)
translation: Sutra of the Remonstrance King (also called Sutra of the Great and Small Remonstrance Kings)

source_sentence: 高王觀世音經
translation: Avalokitêśvara Sutra of King Gao

source_sentence: 法常住經
translation: Sutra on the Eternal Abiding of the Dharma

source_sentence: 右三經同卷。
translation: The right three scriptures are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 那先比丘經一部二卷(或一卷)
translation: One Two-fascicle (or One-fascicle) Sutra of Nāgasena Bhikṣu

source_sentence: 五無返復經(一名五有返復大義經)佛大僧大經耶祇經末羅王經摩達國王經五恐怖世經旃陀越經懈怠耕者經(舊錄云懈怠耕兒經)右八經同卷。
translation: Wufufu jing (a scripture of the great meaning of the five existences returning), Fo dasheng dajing yeji jing malla wang jing mada guo wang jing wujiaoshishi jantaoyue jing lazy plowman jing (old record: lazy plowman jing), the right eight scriptures in one volume.

source_sentence: 右本事等一十三經十一卷同帙。
translation: The right one is composed of thirteen scriptures, including the Śīlâditya-sūtra, and the other eleven are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 重譯經
translation: The Revised Translation of the Sutra

source_sentence: 正法念處經一部七十卷
translation: Sutra of the Mindfulness of the True Dharma, in one 70-volume work

source_sentence: 雜寶藏經一部八卷(或十卷或十三卷)毘耶娑問經一部二卷右二經十卷同帙。
translation: One eight-volume (or ten- or thirteen-volume) version of the Saṃbodhi-sūtra, and one two-volume version of the Vaiśravaṇa-sūtra.

source_sentence: 出曜經一部十九卷
translation: One 19-fascicle edition of the Sutra of the Appearance of Light

source_sentence: 有眾生三世作惡經一卷
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra on the Three Worlds of Evil Actions of Sentient Beings

source_sentence: 右二經二十卷二帙。
translation: The right two scriptures are twenty volumes in two parts.

source_sentence: 賢愚經一部十二卷(或十六卷或十七卷或十五卷)起世因本經一部十卷(一云起世經)雜阿含經一部五十卷修行道地經一部七卷(或六卷)七處三觀經一卷(或二卷)九橫經八正道經五陰譬喻經(一名水沫所漂經)轉法輪經禪行三十七品經獨富長者經馬有八態經(一名馬有八弊惡態經或云馬有八態譬人經)馬有三相經右八經同卷。
translation: 賢愚經一部十二卷(或十六卷或十七卷或十五卷)起世因本經一部十卷(一云起世經)雜阿含經一部五十卷修行道地經一部七卷(或六卷)七處三觀經一卷(或二卷)九橫經八正道經五陰譬喻經(一名水沫所漂經)轉法輪經禪行三十七品經獨富長者經馬有八態經(一名馬有八弊惡態經或云馬有八態譬人經)馬有三相經右八經同卷。

source_sentence: 不自守意經(一名自守經一名自守意經)聖法印經波斯匿王祖母命終經比丘避女惡名欲自殺經戒相應法經(一名戒相應經)戒德香經(一名戒德經)比丘聽施經(一名聽施比丘經)右七經同卷。
translation: The Sutra on Not Keeping One's Own Mind (a sutra on keeping one's own mind and a sutra on keeping one's own mind), the Sutra on the Seal of the Sacred Dharma (a sutra on the end of King Prasenajit's grandmother's life), the Sutra on the Way Concomitant with Morality (a sutra on the Concomitance of Morality), the Sutra on the Scent of Morality (a sutra on the Scent of Morality), the Sutra on the Almsgiving of Monks (a sutra on the Almsgiving of Monks), and the seven sutras on the right side of the same volume.

source_sentence: 雜阿含經一卷
translation: *Saṃyuktâgama-sūtra 1 vol.

source_sentence: 右修行道地等一十八經十一卷同帙。
translation: Right: Shuxing dao di and so forth, one hundred and eighteen sūtras in eleven volumes.

source_sentence: 增一阿含經一部五十卷(內典或五十一卷長房入藏錄四十二卷經)長阿含經一部二十二卷(長房入藏錄云二十五卷一十八經別)中阿含經一部六十卷(或五十八卷)生經一部五卷(或四卷寶唱云論生經)四諦經是法非法經一切流攝守因緣經(一名流攝經一名一切流攝守經吳錄云流攝守因經一名受因經)右三經同卷。
translation: The Incremental Āgama Sutras are fifty volumes long (fifty-one volumes in the Inner Canon or forty-two volumes in the Records of the Changfang Canon), the Longer Āgama Sutras are twenty-two volumes long (twenty-five volumes and one eighteen volumes in the Records of the Changfang Canon), the Middle Āgama Sutras are sixty volumes long (or fifty-eight volumes), the Birth Sutras are five volumes long (or four volumes in the Record of the Jewel Singing Cloud's Treatise on Birth), the Sutra on the Four Truths as Dharmas and Non-Dharmas, and the Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of All Streams Collected and Kept (a sutra on the collection of streams and a sutra on the causes of all streams collected and kept in the Wu Record, a sutra on the causes of receiving), and the right three sutras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 漏分布經
translation: Sutra on the Distribution of Contaminants

source_sentence: 十支居士八城人經
translation: Sutra of the Ten Jīvaka Bhikṣuṇīs and Eight City People

source_sentence: 本相倚致經(吳錄云大相倚致經)
translation: Benxiang yizhi jing (Wu luoyun daxiang yizhi jing)

source_sentence: 緣本致經
translation: Sutra on the Merits

source_sentence: 阿那律八念經(一名禪行斂意經或云直八念經)右五經同卷。
translation: Analuo bainian jing (a scripture on the recitation of meditative practices or the straight eight nirvāṇas), the right five sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 賴吒和羅經(一云羅漢賴吒和羅經)梵摩喻經右二經同卷。
translation: The Rāṣṭrapāla Sutra (a sutra of the Lohan Rāṣṭrapāla) and the Sutra of Brahmā's Exposition (a sutra of the eight precepts) are in the same volume as the two sutras on the right.

source_sentence: 齋經(一名八關齋經一名優婆夷墮舍迦經)申日經釋摩男本經(一名五陰因事經)諸法本經孫多耶致經(一名梵志孫多耶致經)七知經(或云七智經)右六經同卷。
translation: The Zhai jing (a scripture of the eight precepts, a scripture of the upāsikā-dāsaka, a scripture of the five aggregates, a scripture of the causes and conditions of the various dharmas, a scripture of the Brahmā temple, a scripture of the seven knowables, and six scriptures on the right are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 恒水喻經(一名海有八德經一名瞻波比丘經一名法海經長房錄云恒河喻經)比丘問佛多優婆塞命終經佛說求欲經新歲經右四經同卷。
translation: The Sutra of the Ganges River Parable (a Sutra of the Eight Virtues of the Sea, a Sutra of Campā Bhikṣu, a Sutra of the Dharma Sea, and a Sutra of the Ganges River Parable), a Sutra of the Life of Upāsaka, a Sutra of the Questions of the Buddha, and a Sutra of the Desire for a New Year.

source_sentence: 右生經等三十一經十卷同帙。
translation: The right one is the Sutra of Rebirth and the other thirty-one sūtras in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 頂生王故事經(一名文陀竭王經一名頂生王經)泥梨經右二經同卷。
translation: The Sutra of the Story of King Mingsheng (a Sutra of King Mentakagiri and a Sutra of King Mingsheng) and the Niraya Sutra are two sūtras on the right and in the same volume.

source_sentence: 蓱沙王五願經(一名弗迦沙王經)
translation: Sutra of the Five Vows of King 蓱śvara (a Sutra of King Phokṣaśa)

source_sentence: 鸚鵡經(一名兜調經)
translation: Nautilus Sutra (a scripture of the tamer)

source_sentence: 瞿曇彌記果經
translation: Gautamī Kiṃkara-sūtra

source_sentence: 右三經同卷。
translation: The right three sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 鹹水喻經(僧祐錄安公出中阿含舊錄云鹹水譬經出阿含經)閻羅王五天使者經(一名鐵城泥梨經)右二經同卷。
translation: The Salt Water Parable Sutra (Sengyou lu An Gong Chuanzhong ahan xue lu Yun salt water parable sutra out of the ahan sutra) and the King Yama's Five Heavenly Messengers Sutra (a Tie Cheng Nili jing) The right two sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 古來世時經
translation: Sutra of the Age of the Ancient Ones

source_sentence: 長壽王經
translation: Sutra of the Long-life King

source_sentence: 右二經同卷。
translation: The right two scriptures are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 魔嬈亂經一卷(一名弊魔試目連經一名魔王入目揵蘭腹經)梵志阿跋經一卷(一名阿跋摩納經一名佛開解阿跋梵志經)普法義經一卷(亦云普義經亦云具法行經)十報法經一部二卷(一名多增道章經)右頂生王等十三經九卷同帙。
translation: One volume of the Sutra on the Disruption of Māra (a sutra on the Trial of Māra and the Testimony of Māra), one volume of the Sutra on the Brahmā's Avalokitêśvara (a sutra on the Avalokitêśvara and the Brahmā's Avalokitêśvara), one volume of the Sutra on the Universal Meaning of the Dharma (also called the Sutra on the Universal Meaning of the Dharma and the Sutra on the Completeness of the Dharma Practices), two volumes of the Sutra on the Ten Retributions of the Dharma (a sutra on the Increasing Path), and nine volumes of the thirteen sutras on the right-hand side of the king of birth.

source_sentence: 樓炭經一部六卷(或五卷或八卷)
translation: Six volumes of the Lütan jing (either five or eight).

source_sentence: 迦羅越六向拜經一卷(一名六向拜一名大六向拜經一名威花長者六向拜)七佛父母姓字經(一名婦人無匹請佛經一名七佛姓字經)阿難同學經阿那邠坻化七子經三摩竭經(一名須摩提女經一名難國王經一名恕和檀王經寶唱錄云三摩愒經)右四經同卷。
translation: Avalokitêśvara-vairocana-sūtra (a scripture of the six-aspect obeisance, a scripture of the great six-aspect obeisance, and a scripture of the six-aspect obeisance of the Vairocana elder), a scripture of the surnames of the parents of the seven buddhas (a scripture of a woman without a match inviting the Buddha, and a scripture of the surnames of the seven buddhas), a scripture of the students of Ānanda, a scripture of the seven sons of Anāthapiṇḍada, and a scripture of the three makara sutras (a scripture of the Sumati woman, a scripture of the king of Ānanda, a scripture of the king of Śubhadan, and a scripture of the three makara sutras), and the right four scriptures in the same volume.

source_sentence: 力士移山經(一名移山經)
translation: Sutra of the Powerful Man Who Moves Mountains (a Sutra of the Mountain-moving Sutra)

source_sentence: 四未曾有法經
translation: Four Sutras on the Unearthed Dharma

source_sentence: 琉璃王經
translation: Sutra of the Lapis Lazuli King

source_sentence: 鴦崛髻經(一名指鬘經)
translation: Aṅgulimālīya-sūtra (a finger garland sūtra)

source_sentence: 增一阿含經
translation: Increased by One Āgama Sutras

source_sentence: 右五經同卷。
translation: The five scriptures on the right are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 群牛譬經
translation: Sutra of the Parable of the Herd of Oxen

source_sentence: 行七行現報經
translation: Sutra on the Practice of Seven Practices for Present Rewards

source_sentence: 施食獲五福報經(一名福德經一名施色力經)國王不梨先尼十夢經(一名國王七夢經)放牛經右五經同卷。
translation: The Sutra on Giving Food to Obtain the Five Rewards of Good Fortune (a sutra on merit and a sutra on the power of giving form), the Sutra on the King's Ten Dreams (a sutra on the King's Seven Dreams), and the Sutra on Herding Cows (five sūtras on the right) are all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 右樓炭等十六經十卷同帙。
translation: The right sixteen scriptures, including the Lütan scripture, are in the same volume of ten.

source_sentence: 梵網六十二見經一卷(一名梵網經)大般涅槃經一部二卷大般泥洹經一部二卷般泥洹經一卷寂志果經一卷長者子六過出家經大愛道般涅槃經須達經(一名長者須達經一名三歸五戒慈心厭得經)右三經同卷。
translation: The Sutra of Brahmā's Net of Sixty-two Views in One Volume (a Sutra of Brahmā's Net), the Sutra of Nirvana in One Volume (a Sutra of Nirvana in Two Volumes), the Sutra of Nirvana in One Volume (a Sutra of Nirvana in Two Volumes), the Sutra of the Fruit of Tranquility in One Volume (a Sutra of Nirvana in Six Transgressions of the Son of Gṛdhrakūṭa), the Sutra of the Great Aspiration Path (a Sutra of Nirvana in Three Refuges and Five Moral Observances), and the Sutra of Acquired Compassion (a Sutra of Acquired Compassion) are three sūtras on the right side in the same volume.

source_sentence: 右八經八卷同帙。
translation: The right eight sūtras are in eight volumes.

source_sentence: 別譯雜阿含經一部二十卷
translation: Bieyi za ahan jing a 20-volume work

source_sentence: 坐禪三昧經一部三卷(或二卷)
translation: Sutra of the Concentration of Sitting Meditation, in one three volume set (or two volumes)

source_sentence: 玉耶經(一名長者詣佛說子婦無敬一名七婦經)阿遬達經盂蘭盆經(右別本五紙云淨土盂蘭經未知所出)四自侵經灌蠟經(一名般泥洹後四輩灌蠟經)報恩奉盆經右六經同卷。
translation: The Yuye Sutra (an elder who visited the Buddha and taught his children and their wives about irreverence, a scripture on the seven wives), the Avata Sutra, the ullambana Sutra (a scripture on the five paper clouds of the Pure Land, the ullambana sutra of unknown origin), the Sutra on the Consecration of Wax for the Four Aggressions (a scripture on the consecration of wax for the four groups after the Nirvana period), and the Sutra on the Repayment of Kindness to the Bund, the six scriptures on the right, all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 阿蘭若習禪法經二卷(或無經字)
translation: Two Fascicle Sutra on the Practice of Meditation in Araṇya (some do not have the letters for the sutra)

source_sentence: 罪福報應經一卷(一名分別報應經)業報差別經一卷摩登女經(一名摩鄧女經一名阿難為蠱道女惑經)摩登女解形中六事經阿難分別經(一名分別經一名阿難問事佛吉凶經)五母子經沙彌羅經右五經同卷。
translation: One volume of the Sutra on the Retribution of Sins and Fortunes (a sutra on the discrimination of retribution), one volume of the Sutra on the Distinction of Karmic Retribution, one volume of the Sutra on the Mātaṅgī Girl (a sutra on the Mātaṅgī Girl and a sutra on Ānanda's Confusion with the Trickster Girl), one volume of the Sutra on the Six Phenomena in the Mātaṅgī Girl's Understanding of Form, one volume of the Sutra on the Discrimination of Ānanda (a sutra on the Discrimination of Ānanda's Questions about the Buddha's Fortunes), one volume of the Sutra on the Five Mothers and Sons, the Sutra on Śāmila, and the right five sutras in the same volume.

source_sentence: 罪業報應教化地獄經一卷(或云地獄報應經)阿難問事佛吉凶經一卷(僧祐錄云或名阿難問經)右坐禪等十七經十一卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Retribution of Crime and the Teaching of Hell in One Volume (also called the Sutra of the Retribution of Hell), the Sutra of Anan's Questions to the Buddha about Good and Evil in One Volume (also called the Sutra of Anan's Questions in the Sengyou Record), and the seventeen sutras on sitting meditation and so forth in eleven volumes are in the same book.

source_sentence: 摩登伽經一部三卷(或二卷)
translation: The Sutra of Mātaṅga is a three-volume work (or two-volume work).

source_sentence: 舍頭諫經一卷(一名太子二十八宿經一名虎耳太子化度錄云虎耳意經第二出與摩登伽經同本異出與漢世高出者少異)義足經一部二卷修行本起經一部二卷(寶唱錄云一名宿行本起經)太子本起瑞應經一部二卷(初出亦云瑞應本起經亦云中本起經)右五經十卷同帙。
translation: One volume of the Shadouji jing (a princely scripture of the twenty-eight constellations, a princely scripture of the transformation of the ear of the tiger, a scripture of the wish of the ear of the tiger, the second one out of the same edition as the scripture of the Mātaṅga, a different one out of the same edition, and a lesser one out of the Han Dynasty), one two-fascicle scripture of the origin of cultivation, and one two-fascicle scripture (a scripture of the origin of the practice of the constellations, as recorded in the Baochang lu), one two-fascicle scripture of the origin of the princely one, and one two-fascicle scripture of the auspicious response (the first one out of the two is also called the auspicious response, and the middle one is also called the origin of the scripture).

source_sentence: 中本起經一部二卷(或云太子中本起經)過去現在因果經一部四卷雜藏經(與鬼問目連餓鬼報應目連說地獄餓鬼因緣等四本同體異名別譯見寶唱錄)鬼問目連經餓鬼報應經(一名目連說地獄餓鬼因緣經)右三經同卷。
translation: The Sutra on the Origin of the Middle Arising, one two-fascicle work (also called the Prince's Sutra on the Origin of the Middle Arising), the Sutra on Past and Present Causes and Effects, one four-fascicle work, and the Tripiṭaka Sutra (the same body as the Sutra on the Exorcism of Mucilin, the Retribution of Hungry Ghosts, and the Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of Hungry Ghosts in Hell as Mucilin's Explanation of the Causes and Conditions of Hungry Ghosts).

source_sentence: 興起行經一部二卷(一名十緣經)
translation: The Sutra of Arising Practices, 1 part, 2 volumes (1 part, Sutra of the Ten Conditions)

source_sentence: 奈女耆域經一卷(或云柰女經)
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra of Nymphomaniac Jīvaka (or the Sutra of Nymphomaniac)

source_sentence: 貧窮老公經(一名貧老經)
translation: Sutra of the Poor Husband (a scripture of the poor old man)

source_sentence: 越難經(一名難經第二出寶唱錄云目難長者經)七女經(一名七女本經長房錄云出阿毘曇)龍王兄弟經(一名難陀龍王經)八師經四十二章經所欲致患經右七經同卷。
translation: The Sutra of Ekaku Nandan (a sutra on the second rank of the Nandanagiri sūtra), the Sutra of the Seven Maidens (a sutra on the seven maidens, recorded in the Changfang lu, out of the Abhidharma), the Sutra of the Brothers of the Dragon King (a sutra on the Dragon King of Nandanagiri), the Sutra of the Eight Teachers, the Sutra of the Forty-two Chapters, and the Sutra on the Desire to Cause Hardship.

source_sentence: 右中本起等十四經十一卷同帙。
translation: The fourteen scriptures on the rise of the middle king and others are in eleven volumes.

source_sentence: 優婆夷淨行經一部二卷
translation: Upāsikā Prabhākaramitra: A Two-fascicle Sutra of Pure Conduct

source_sentence: 僧護因緣經一卷(或無因緣)
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra of the Causes and Conditions of the Saṃgha (or lacking causes and conditions)

source_sentence: 佛入涅槃密迹金剛力士哀戀經一卷
translation: Sutra on the Lamentation of the Vajrasattvas, the Esoteric Teachings of the Buddha's Entry into Nirvāṇa, One Volume

source_sentence: 佛滅度後棺斂葬送經(一名比丘師經一名師比丘經)頞多和多耆經迦旃延說法沒盡偈經輪轉五道罪福報應經右四經同卷。
translation: Sutra of the Coffin Recluse and Burial After the Death of the Buddha (a Sutra of the Master Bhikṣu and a Sutra of the Master Bhikṣu), Sutra of the Exposition of the Dharma of Kātyāyana without Ending the Verses, Sutra of the Transmigration of the Five Destinies and the Retribution of Sins and Merits, and the right four sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 作佛形像經(一名優填王作佛形像經一名作像因緣經)十二因緣阿含口解經右二經同卷。
translation: Sutra on the Production of Buddha Images (a Sutra on the Production of Buddha Images by King Udayan and a Sutra on the Production of Buddha Images) and Sutra on the Oral Explanation of the Twelve Causal Links to the Āgamas (right two sūtras in the same volume).

source_sentence: 未曾有經
translation: Weicengyou jing

source_sentence: 護淨經
translation: Sutra on the Protection of Purity

source_sentence: 木槵子經
translation: Sutra of the Wooden Hat

source_sentence: 普達王經
translation: Sutra of King Potala

source_sentence: 盧至長者經
translation: Sutra of Elder Lucius

source_sentence: 右五經同卷。
translation: The right five scriptures are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 五王經
translation: Five Kings' Sutra

source_sentence: 旃檀越國王經
translation: Sutra of King Candanavatī

source_sentence: 錫杖經
translation: Sutra of the Pewter Stick

source_sentence: 無上處經
translation: Wushan douzhi jing

source_sentence: 右四經同卷。
translation: The right four sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 右淨行等十八經八卷同帙。
translation: The right eighteen scriptures, including the Pure Conduct Sutra, are in eight volumes.

source_sentence: 小乘毘尼藏三十五部(二百六十卷)二十八帙十誦律一部六十一卷四分律一部四十卷(或七十卷或六十卷)摩訶僧祇律一部四十卷彌沙塞五分律一部三十四卷善見毘婆沙律一部十八卷鼻柰耶律一部十卷(一名戒因緣經)大愛道比丘尼經一部二卷解脫戒本一卷(出迦葉毘律)十誦比丘戒本一卷十誦比丘尼戒本一卷僧祇戒本一卷僧祇大比丘戒本一卷僧祇比丘尼戒本一卷四分比丘僧戒本一卷四分比丘尼戒本一卷右九經十卷同帙。
translation: The Tripiṭaka of Lesser Vehicle Vinaya consists of thirty-five books (260 volumes) and twenty-eight volumes.

source_sentence: 大比丘三千威儀經一部三卷
translation: One three-volume edition of the Mahābhikṣu's Sutra of Three Thousand Regulations

source_sentence: 戒消災經一卷(或云戒伏消災)
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra on Eliminating Disaster by Moral discipline (also called Eliminating Disaster by Moral discipline)

source_sentence: 彌沙塞比丘戒本一卷(或云五分戒本)大沙門百一羯磨一卷十誦僧尼要事羯磨一部二卷曇無德羯磨一卷四分羯磨一卷右七經十卷同帙。
translation: The Mahīśāsaka-bhikṣu-prātimokṣa-sūtra in one volume (or the five-part prātimokṣa-sūtra), the hundred and one karmas of the ascetic community in one volume, the ten recitations of the essentials of saṃgha and nuns in one volume, the two-fascicle Dharmakṣa-sūtra in one volume, the four-part karmas in one volume, and the right seven sūtras in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 優婆離問佛經一卷(或云優波離律)真偽沙門經一卷(一名摩訶比丘經)迦葉禁戒經一卷(一名摩訶比丘經一名真偽沙門經)沙彌十戒并威儀一卷沙彌離戒經一卷舍利弗問經一卷律二十二明了論一卷(亦直云明了論)沙彌威儀經一卷優婆塞五戒相一卷優婆塞五戒威儀經一卷右十經論等十卷同帙。
translation: 優婆離問佛經一卷(或云優波離律)真偽沙門經一卷(一名摩訶比丘經)迦葉禁戒經一卷(一名摩訶比丘經一名真偽沙門經)沙彌十戒并威儀一卷沙彌離戒經一卷舍利弗問經一卷律二十二明了論一卷(亦直云明了論)沙彌威儀經一卷優婆塞五戒相一卷優婆塞五戒威儀經一卷右十經論等十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 毘尼母論一部八卷
translation: One eight-fascicle edition of the Treatise on the Mother of the Sarvâstivāda Vinaya

source_sentence: 薩婆多摩得勒伽一部十卷
translation: Sarvâstivāda-mātṛkā in one ten-volume work

source_sentence: 薩婆多毘尼毘婆沙一部九卷
translation: Sarvâstivāda-vinaya-vibhāṣā in one nine volume work

source_sentence: 小乘阿毘達摩藏三十六部(七百四十四卷七十三帙)大毘婆沙論一部二百卷順正理論一部八十卷阿毘曇八揵度毘婆沙一部八十四卷(或一百九卷或六十卷)顯宗論一部四十卷發智論一部二十卷阿毘達磨俱舍論一部三十卷俱舍論頌一卷尊婆須蜜所集論一部十二卷(或十卷)鞞婆沙阿毘曇論一部十九卷(或十五卷或十四卷或云毘婆沙亦云廣說)阿毘曇八揵度一部三十卷(或二十卷一名迦旃延阿毘曇八揵度)舍利弗阿毘曇一部三十卷(或二十卷或二十二卷)成實論一部二十四卷(或二十卷或十六卷或十四卷)法勝阿毘曇論一部六卷右三論四十一卷四帙。
translation: 小乘阿毘達摩藏三十六部(七百四十四卷七十三帙)大毘婆沙論一部二百卷順正理論一部八十卷阿毘曇八揵度毘婆沙一部八十四卷(或一百九卷或六十卷)顯宗論一部四十卷發智論一部二十卷阿毘達磨俱舍論一部三十卷俱舍論頌一卷尊婆須蜜所集論一部十二卷(或十卷)鞞婆沙阿毘曇論一部十九卷(或十五卷或十四卷或云毘婆沙亦云廣說)阿毘曇八揵度一部三十卷(或二十卷一名迦旃延阿毘曇八揵度)舍利弗阿毘曇一部三十卷(或二十卷或二十二卷)成實論一部二十四卷(或二十卷或十六卷或十四卷)法勝阿毘曇論一部六卷右三論四十一卷四帙。

source_sentence: 雜阿毘曇心一部十一卷
translation: *Saṃyuktâbhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra in eleven volumes

source_sentence: 分別功德論一部五卷(或四卷或三卷)三法度論一部三卷(或二卷)阿毘曇甘露味一部二卷(或云甘露味阿毘曇)右三論十卷同帙。
translation: The Discriminating Qualities Treatise is a five-volume work (or four-volume or three-volume work), the Three Dharma Perfection Treatises are a three-volume work (or two-volume work), and the Taste of the Nectar of the Abhidharma is a two-volume work (or the Taste of the Nectar of the Abhidharma).

source_sentence: 眾事分阿毘曇論一部十二卷
translation: The *Mahāyāyāna Abhidharma-śāstra in twelve volumes

source_sentence: 解脫道論一部十三卷(或十二卷)
translation: Treatise on the Way to Liberation in One Thirteen (or Twelve) Volume Set

source_sentence: 四諦論一部四卷
translation: Four Treatises in One Volume

source_sentence: 隨相論一部二卷(或云求那摩諦隨相論)入阿毘達磨論一部二卷異部宗輪論一卷十八部論部異執論(一名執部異論)右二論同卷。
translation: Following the Characteristics, a two-volume treatise (also called Following the Characteristics of the Nāgârthas), Entering the Abhidharma Path, a two-volume treatise, and the Treatise on the Wheel of the Different Divisions of the Treatise, a one-volume treatise on the Different Attachments of the Eighteen Divisions of the Treatise (a Treatise on the Different Attachments of the Divisions), the two right-hand treatises are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 右六論十卷同帙。
translation: The right six treatises are in ten volumes and are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 立世阿毘曇論一部十卷
translation: Lishiapitan lun (立世 abhidharma lun) 1:10 vols.

source_sentence: 俱舍釋論一部二十二卷
translation: Commentary on the Kuśa śāstra in one twenty-two volume series

source_sentence: 集異門足論一部二十卷
translation: Jichimen falu shilun 1:20

source_sentence: 法蘊足論一部十二卷
translation: Dharmapāda-śāstra in one 12-volume work

source_sentence: 識身足論一部十六卷
translation: Shishenzu lun (識身足論) in one 16-volume work

source_sentence: 阿毘曇心一部四卷
translation: One Abhidharma Heart in Four Fascicles

source_sentence: 右二論二十卷二帙。
translation: The right two treatises are twenty volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 品類足論一部十八卷
translation: The Prakaraṇapāda-śāstra is one volume and eighteen treatises.

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨五事論一部二卷
translation: One Abhidharma Five Phenomena Treatise (2 volumes)

source_sentence: 右二論二十卷二帙。
translation: The right two treatises are twenty volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 界身足論一部三卷
translation: The Dhātukāya-pāda-śāstra is a three-volume work.

source_sentence: 三彌底論一部三卷
translation: Sammitīya-nikāya-śāstra, a three-volume work

source_sentence: 辟支佛因緣論一部二卷
translation: Pratibhāna Treatise on Causes and Conditions of Buddhas (1 vol.)

source_sentence: 右三論八卷同帙。
translation: The right three treatises are in eight volumes.

source_sentence: ◎賢聖集傳二十一部(四十一卷)四帙佛所行讚傳一部五卷(馬鳴菩薩造)阿育王傳一部五卷(或七卷)右二傳十卷同帙。
translation: Śrīgarbhavikrāmin Biographies, 21 parts (41 volumes) in four parts; Buddhacarita Biographies, five parts (made by Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva); Aśoka Biographies, five parts (or seven parts) in two parts; and the right two biographies, ten parts, in the same part.

source_sentence: 禪祕要經一部四卷(亦名禪祕要無經字)禪祕要經一部五卷(一名禪法要或為二卷)禪法要解一部二卷治禪病祕要一卷右四經十二卷同帙。
translation: The Secret Essentials of Meditation in Four Volumes (also called the Secret Essentials of Meditation without the word sūtra), the Secret Essentials of Meditation in Five Volumes (one is the Essentials of the Chan Dharma or two volumes), the Essentials of the Understanding of the Chan Dharma in Two Volumes, and the Secret Essentials for Healing the Maladies of Meditation in One Volume, right, and the twelve volumes of the four sūtras in the same volume.

source_sentence: 百喻集一部二卷
translation: A two-fascicle collection of the 100 parables.

source_sentence: 菩薩本緣集一部三卷(僧伽斯那撰或四卷)龍樹菩薩為禪陀迦王說要偈(勸發諸王要偈)請賓頭盧法賓頭盧為王說法(西域抄集)賓頭盧突羅闍為優陀延王說法右四經同卷。
translation: A three-volume collection of the bodhisattvas' original conditions (written by Saṃghasena or in four volumes), in which Nāgârjuna Bodhisattva spoke essential verses for King Chanthaka (essential verses for encouraging the kings), invited Piṇḍola Dharma, and Piṇḍola preached for the king (a collection copied from the western regions), and Piṇḍola Turāja preached for King Udayana.

source_sentence: 馬鳴菩薩傳
translation: Biography of Aśvaghoṣa Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 龍樹菩薩傳
translation: Biography of Nāgârjuna Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 提婆菩薩傳
translation: Biography of Devabodhisattva

source_sentence: 婆藪盤豆傳
translation: Vasubandhu's Biography

source_sentence: 右四傳同卷。
translation: The right four sūtras are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 四阿含暮抄一部二卷
translation: Si ahan muqie jieyi 2 rolls

source_sentence: 右百喻等十一經九卷同帙。
translation: Right: Eleven Sutras of the Hundred Parables and Others, in Nine Volumes and One Volume.

source_sentence: 大阿羅漢難陀蜜多法住記一卷
translation: One Fascicle of the Nandamitra Dharma Abiding Record of the Great Arhat

source_sentence: 法句集一部二卷
translation: Dharmapāda, a two-volume collection

source_sentence: 僧伽羅剎集經一部三卷
translation: Saṃghârasa-saṃghavajñāna-sūtra, one volume in three

source_sentence: 付法藏經傳一部四卷
translation: A Four-fascicle Commentary on the Sutra of the Dharma Canon

source_sentence: 右四傳十卷同帙。
translation: The right four biographies are in ten volumes and one book.

source_sentence: 大周刊定眾經目錄卷第十四(見定流行人藏目卷下)◎賢聖集傳二十六部四十四卷四帙佛所行讚傳一部五卷(馬鳴菩薩造)禪法要解一部二卷勝宗十句義論一卷右三經八卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Settlers of the Great Weekly Record, Volume XIV (see the Catalogue of the Collection of the Settlers of Popularity, Volume II) ◎ The Biography of the Collection of Good Saints, Twenty-six Parts, Forty-four Volumes, Four Fascicles, One Five-Fascicle Biography of the Buddhas' Practices (Made by Ma Ming Bodhisattva) ▪ The Essentials of the Chan Method, One Two-Fascicle Treatise on the Ten Statements of the Victorious School, One Fascicle, Right Three Sutras, Eight Fascicles, Same Fascicle.

source_sentence: 禪祕要經四卷(亦云禪祕要無經字)禪祕要經一部五卷(一名禪法要或為三卷)治禪病祕要一卷右三經十卷同帙。
translation: The Secret Essentials of Meditation in Four Volumes (also called the Secret Essentials of Meditation without the word sūtra), the Secret Essentials of Meditation in Five Volumes (one is the Essentials of the Chan Dharma or three volumes), the Secret Essentials for Healing the Maladies of Meditation in One Volume, and the Right Three Sutras in Ten Volumes are all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 百喻集一部二卷
translation: A Two-fascicle Anthology of the Hundred Parables

source_sentence: 菩薩本緣集一部三卷(僧伽斯那撰或四卷)阿育王傳一部五卷(或七卷)孛經抄集一卷無明羅剎集一卷分別業報略集經(大勇菩薩撰)龍樹菩薩為禪陀迦王說要偈(亦云勸發諸王要偈)右二經同卷。
translation: A collection of the bodhisattvas' original conditions in three volumes (compiled by Saṃghasena or in four volumes), a biography of King Aśoka in five volumes (or in seven volumes), a collection of scriptures on the scriptures of Marco, a collection of nescience and lassa in one volume, and a brief collection of scriptures that discern the effects of karma (compiled by Dānavat).

source_sentence: 金七十論一部三卷
translation: Jin qishi lun a three volume work

source_sentence: 請賓頭盧經
translation: Sutra on the Merit of Calling on Piṇḍola

source_sentence: 賓頭盧為王說法(西域抄集)
translation: Piṇḍola's Exposition of the Dharma for the King (Collected Documents from the Western Regions)

source_sentence: 賓頭盧突羅闍為優陀延王說法
translation: Piṇḍolabbaradvāja preaches the Dharma to King Udayana

source_sentence: 右三經同卷。
translation: The three scriptures on the right are in the same volume.

source_sentence: 馬鳴菩薩傳
translation: Biography of Aśvaghoṣa Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 龍樹菩薩傳
translation: Biography of Nāgârjuna Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 提婆菩薩傳
translation: Biography of Devabodhisattva

source_sentence: 婆藪槃豆傳
translation: Vasubandhu's Biography

source_sentence: 撰集三藏及雜傳(西域聖賢所撰出真寂寺錄)右五傳同卷自百喻等十四經十卷同帙。
translation: Collected Tripiṭaka and Miscellaneous Biographies (Compiled by the Sage of the Western Regions and Produced by the Record of Zenjiji Temple) The right five biographies are in the same volume, and the fourteen scriptures, including the Hundred Parables, are in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 四阿含暮抄二集
translation: Si ahan muqie xianji jing

source_sentence: 大阿羅漢陀蜜多法住記一卷
translation: Record of the Abiding Dharma of the Great Arhat Dharmadhātu in One Volume

source_sentence: 法句集一部二卷
translation: Dharmapāda, a two-volume collection

source_sentence: 僧伽羅剎集經一部三卷
translation: Saṃghârasa-saṃghavajñāna-sūtra, one volume in three

source_sentence: 付法藏經傳一部四卷
translation: A Four-fascicle Commentary on the Sutra of the Dharma Canon

source_sentence: 右五傳等十二卷同帙。
translation: The right five biographies and other twelve volumes are in the same book.

source_sentence: 武周刊定眾經目錄卷第十四(見定流行入藏目卷下)天策萬歲元年十月二十六日。
translation: Wushou Dengzong jing mulu, vol. 14 (see Dengzong puzang mulu, vol. 2).

source_sentence: 都檢校刊定經目及經真偽佛授記寺大德僧明佺。
translation: It was the first time that the title of the scripture catalog was revised, and the scriptures were authentic and counterfeit, as shown by the great virtuous monk Ming Nephew of Foguanji si.
